title: (x) Rocktober "Steel" Heavy Metal sans w/ tiny serifs - Copperplate Gothic {Yves}
content:
I'm 100% sure I have this typeface, but I can't for the life of me remember what it's called. Anyone?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202122935im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture-1_4879.jpg)
author: Spencer Cross

comments.content: Nah, they just added some spikes on [Copperplate Gothic 33 BC](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202122935/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/copperplate_gothic_std_complete_vp/) and stretched it even wider. :^/
